name: Baxia, Brightness of the Yang Zing
effectText:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Wyrm monsters
When this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target cards on the field, up to the number of different original Attributes of the Wyrm monsters used for the Synchro Summon of this card; shuffle them into the Deck. Once per turn: You can target 1 card you control and 1 Level 4 or lower monster in your GY; destroy that card on the field, and if you do, Special Summon that other monster from the GY.
